option(USE_SYSTEM_OPENMM "Should we use the system OpenMM?" OFF)
option(USE_SYSTEM_GSL "Should we use the system GSL?" OFF)

if(USE_SYSTEM_OPENMM)
  find_package(OpenMM REQUIRED)
  list(APPEND CANDIY_THIRDPARTYLIBS_ARGS
    "-DOPENMM_INCLUDE_DIRS:PATH=${OPENMM_INCLUDE_DIRS}"
    "-DOPENMM_LIBRARIES:FILEPATH=${OPENMM_LIBRARIES}")
else()
  include(External_OpenMM)
  list(APPEND CANDIY_THIRDPARTYLIBS_ARGS
       "-DOPENMM_ROOT_DIR:PATH=${CANDIY_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
endif()

if(USE_SYSTEM_GSL)
  find_package(GSL REQUIRED)
  list(APPEND CANDIY_THIRDPARTYLIBS_ARGS
    "-DGSL_INCLUDE_DIRS:PATH=${GSL_INCLUDE_DIRS}"
    "-DGSL_LIBRARIES:FILEPATH=${GSL_LIBRARIES}")
else()
  include(External_GSL)
  list(APPEND CANDIY_THIRDPARTYLIBS_ARGS
       "-DGSL_ROOT_DIR:PATH=${CANDIY_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
endif()

include(External_Chemfiles)
list(APPEND CANDIY_THIRDPARTYLIBS_ARGS
     "-DCHEMFILES_ROOT:PATH=${CANDIY_INSTALL_PREFIX}"
)

set(CANDIY_THIRDPARTYLIBS_ARGS "${CANDIY_THIRDPARTYLIBS_ARGS}" PARENT_SCOPE)
